name: intentioned
content:

Add to word list
having intentions of the type mentioned: well-intentioned I'm sure he's well-intentioned - he wouldn't mean any harm. Despite the best-intentioned efforts, accidents are part of the construction industry. a criminally-intentioned group See
intention
More examplesFewer examplesThe best-intentioned parents can find it hard to set curfews and limit privileges.Such proposals are ill-intentioned and probably not effective.a badly-intentioned interventiongood-intentioned volunteersHis actions were generously intentioned.
